abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Water
            Resources Development Technical Assistance Project is to
            build the recipient's capacity to progressively
            undertake strategic basin planning and to improve project
            preparation for water resources development. This
            restructuring paper seeks Regional Vice President (RVP)
            approval to extend the closing date of the Afghanistan
            Reconstruction Trust Fund (ARTF) grant for the project from
            March 31, 2011 to March 31, 2013. This first extension is
            required to provide adequate time to complete the project
            activities which have been considerably delayed due to
            factors outside the control of the Government and the
            project implementing agency. The total project cost was
            estimated at US$ 15.25 million. The project implementation
            was divided in two phases with each phase covering a
            two-year period. The ARTF grant agreement for phase one of
            the project (US$ 5.5 million) was signed on March 23, 2009
            with a grant closing date of March 31, 2011.
